categories: Category:Sith acolytes and apprentices of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Niloc was a male human Sith Acolyte who attended the Sith Academy on Korriban during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Niloc was determined to pass the trials which Overseer Harkun instructed, but he disappeared during the trials and was likely killed.
